title: RHOC Recap (All Aboard Shannon's Bday) + RHOD Recap (LeeAnne's Bachelorette & Haunted House)

description:
Danny recaps this week's Real Housewives of Orange County, which featured the return of Meghan King Edmonds, and an outing for Shannon's Birthday. Danny also breaks down this week's Real Housewives of Dallas, which showed LeeAnne's bachelorette party and a trip to a haunted house.


RHOD Recap: 31:06ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
